TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Husida, title = Husida, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Husida} }

S.FORM: Husida Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Husida a niyaro', 41 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 133 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 123 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 86%, Rukai 5%, Cou 1%, Paiwan 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Hosida Itiniay i Taoyoan Cen no Kaohsiong ko Hosida a niyaro', 41 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 133 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 123 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 86%, Rokai 5%, Coo 1%, Paiwan 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
